org.locationtech.geowave.mapreduce

Class AbstractGeoWaveJobRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
      • org.locationtech.geowave.mapreduce.AbstractGeoWaveJobRunner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GeoWaveDedupeJobRunner

    public abstract class AbstractGeoWaveJobRunner
extends org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
implements org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool
    This class can run a basic job to query GeoWave. It manages datastore connection params, adapters, indices, query, min splits and max splits.
